task.title: How to subtract numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions about using the Subtract feature of the JPS Calculator.

taskbody.prereq: To successfully subtract numbers, you must know what is subtraction
taskbody.result: The result from the subtraction is displayed.
taskbody.example: You want to subtract 5 from 6. The equation will look like 6-5=1. You enter 6. Press minus button.Then enter 5. Press equals button. The result 1 appears on the screen.
